articles.title: UK unemployment drops as firms hire amid Covid easing - The Guardian
articles.description: Rate fell for third consecutive month in three months to March, according to ONS
articles.content:
UK employers who were getting ready for the easing of lockdown started hiring again in March, driving down unemployment for a third consecutive month, according to official figures.
